title: New: KNESSET – Holocene (Bon Iver Cover)
body:
Another buzz, another **Bon Iver** cover, this time from LA quartet **KNESSET**.

Whilst it doesn’t revamp _Holocene_ to the same extent that [_Avec Sans_ reinvented **Perth**](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/16045-video-avec-sans-perth-bon-iver-cover/), it’s done pleasantly enough, and with a respectable appreciation for the original. Adding a shoegaze touch towards the final minute or two of the track, the vocals verge upon strained at times, yet in a delicately refined manner. Who knew Bon Iver wrote anthems? Check it out below and grab a free download via [RCRD LBL](http://rcrdlbl.com/2012/07/11/premiere_knesset_holocene_bon_iver_cover_).
